Query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `company` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `owner` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `slogan` VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mobile1` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mobile2` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `email1` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `email2` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `landline1` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `landline2` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `website` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `address_line1` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `address_line2` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `city` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `state` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `country` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `zip` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `logo` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `company` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `gstin` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `logo`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS  `role_master` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(1200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;INSERT INTO `role_master` (`name`,`description`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Superadmin', '') AS tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM `role_master` WHERE `name` = 'Superadmin') LIMIT 1;INSERT INTO `role_master` (`name`,`description`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Siteadmin', '') AS tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM `role_master` WHERE `name` = 'Siteadmin') LIMIT 1;INSERT INTO `role_master` (`name`,`description`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'HR', '') AS tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM `role_master` WHERE `name` = 'HR') LIMIT 1;INSERT INTO `role_master` (`name`,`description`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Staff', '') AS tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM `role_master` WHERE `name` = 'Staff') LIMIT 1;INSERT INTO `role_master` (`name`,`description`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Manager', '') AS tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM `role_master` WHERE `name` = 'Manager') LIMIT 1;INSERT INTO `role_master` (`name`,`description`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Campaign', '') AS tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM `role_master` WHERE `name` = 'Campaign') LIMIT 1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS  `designation_master` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(1200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `employees` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(120) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `address` VARCHAR(1200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mobile1` BIGINT(12) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mobile2` BIGINT(12) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `email` VARCHAR(150) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `dob` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `doj` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL ,`password` VARCHAR(120) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `role` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL ,  `shiftid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `profilepic` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `adhaar_pic` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `resume` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `uuid` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mobile_id` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `employees` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `allow_bg_location` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `resume`;ALTER TABLE `employees` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `firstlogin` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `role`;ALTER TABLE `employees` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `uid` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `firstlogin`;ALTER TABLE `employees` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `gender` VARCHAR(6) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `address`;ALTER TABLE `employees` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `pan` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `uid`;ALTER TABLE `employees` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `emp_code` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `resume`;ALTER TABLE `employees` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `designation` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `emp_code`;ALTER TABLE `employees` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `manager_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `designation`;INSERT INTO `employees` (`name`,`address`, `mobile1`,`email`,`password`, `role`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Mayur Mhatre', 'Pawar Nagar, Thane', 9768241151, 'mhatre975@gmail.com', 'eca3a1d719bfd648764ca163f9bb43e7', 1) AS tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM `employees` WHERE `mobile1` = 9768241151 and email='mhatre975@gmail.com') LIMIT 1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `salary_master` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `employee_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `fixed` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `earned` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `deductions` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `apprisal_date` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `salary_master` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `net_salary` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `apprisal_date`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `loan` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `employee_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `loan_amt` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `tenure` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `emi` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `interest_rate` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `approval_amt` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `approval_status` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `note` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `starting_month` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL, `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ,`createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `loan` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `loan_amt_paid_date` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER `tenure`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS  `leaves` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `employee_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `leave_type` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `from_date` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `to_date` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `reason` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `approval_status` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `note` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `half_day_sift` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,`status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ,`createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `shift_management` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(120) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `intime` TIME NULL DEFAULT NULL , `outtime` TIME NULL DEFAULT NULL , `latemark_interval` VARCHAR(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `halfday_interval` VARCHAR(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,`status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `shift_management` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `transaction_mode` VARCHAR(120) NULL DEFAULT 'CICO' AFTER `name`

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `attendance` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `employee_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `date` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `intime` TIME NULL DEFAULT NULL , `in_address` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `in_lanLang` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `outtime` TIME NULL DEFAULT NULL , `out_address` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `out_latlang` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `regularise_status` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `reason` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,`companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `attendance` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `isonduty` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `regularise_status`;ALTER TABLE `attendance` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `onduty_approval` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `isonduty`;ALTER TABLE `attendance` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `uuid` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `onduty_approval`;ALTER TABLE `attendance` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `out_uuid` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `uuid`;ALTER TABLE `attendance` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER `out_uuid`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `employee_reviews` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `employee_id` INT NOT NULL , `note` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `review` FLOAT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL ,`companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `employee_reviews` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `reviews_types` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `review`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `salaray_process` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `employee_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `salary_month` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `working_days` FLOAT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `fixed` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `earned` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `deductions` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `net_salary` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL ,`companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `salaray_process` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `finalfixedearns` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `deductions`;ALTER TABLE `salaray_process` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `working_half_days` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `working_days`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `loan_payment` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `loan_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `employee_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `emi` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `paid_date` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `recieved_by` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `note` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ,`createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL ,`companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `advertisements` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `title` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `shorten_url` VARCHAR(150) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `file_index` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `enquiry_form` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `advertisements` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `whatsapp_no` VARCHAR(12) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `shorten_url`;ALTER TABLE `advertisements` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `whatsapp_msg` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `whatsapp_no`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `advertisements_feedback` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `adv_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `name` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `contacts` VARCHAR(150) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `message` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `emails` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `advertisements_feedback` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `remark` VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `status`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `emp_attendance_location` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(120) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `lat` VARCHAR(120) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `long` VARCHAR(120) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `policies` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(120) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `policies` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `filename` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `description`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bg_locations` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `loc_time` TIME NULL DEFAULT NULL , `loc_lanLang` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `advertising_partners` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `Address` VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `mobile1` VARCHAR(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `mobile2` VARCHAR(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `unique_number` VARCHAR(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `advertising_partners` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `uuid` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `unique_number`;ALTER TABLE `advertising_partners` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `creditpoints` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `uuid`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `office_locations` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `address` VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `lat` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `lang` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `website_visitors` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `ip` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `response` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,  `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `website_visitors` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `adv_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `id`;
